overview: A 'bombshell' documentary about the impact of fracking with exclusive interviews from oil and gas industry leaders, independent experts and impacted residents. TRIPLE DIVIDE covers five years (2011 - 2016) of cradle-to-grave investigations by investigative news nonprofit Public Herald that featured how regulators and industry kept water contamination "off the books." Originally released as a 90-minute feature in 2013, this iteration of TRIPLE DIVIDE is updated with Public Herald's continued investigations through 2016.
tagline: The impact of shale gas extraction on people.
title: Triple Divide
